title: Robotic Teleoperation Research
description: Conducted research on Apple Vision Pro–based teleoperation, developing a Python + Docker pipeline for real-time robot control and presenting results that improved joint alignment by 88.6% and reduced jitter by 30%.

title: Call Captioner
description: Developed a real-time AI captioning system for a company project using OpenAI and FastAPI, improving contextual accuracy by 40% and cutting latency by 35%.

title: Motion
description: Creating a full-stack event app supported by Husky Coding Club enabling map-based event discovery and drawing a 100+ user waitlist.

title: FlightDB
description: Built a PostgreSQL-backed flight management system in Java with secure authentication, transaction-safe bookings, and flight search functionality.

title: Campus Paths
description: Built a JavaFX campus map that visualizes shortest walking routes using a custom weighted graph and Dijkstra’s algorithm.

title: Wacky Wheels
description: Built a 3D racing game in Unity with custom terrains, checkpoints, and a ghost car system, reducing in-game bugs by 90%.

title: Pokemon Legendary Predictor
description: Built predictive models and visualizations in Python using Kaggle datasets to analyze Pokémon ratings and airline passenger satisfaction.

title: Artificial Caffeine
description: Built a real-time facial detection system in Python using OpenCV and MediaPipe that triggered actions based on gestures and eye-closure alerts.

title: Song Ranker
description: Built a full-stack Node.js app integrating the Spotify API for automated playlist curation and real-time song tracking.

title: Flyng
description: Built a Google Cloud web app at DubHacks that connects travelers in airports based on shared flights, interests, and wait times.

title: Hear Our Hands
description: Hackathon project focused on accessibility and communication technology, developing innovative solutions for hearing-impaired individuals through hand gesture recognition and audio processing.
